text:
August 18, 1955
Mr. Jack K. Westbrook
Program Director, WUOT
University of Tennessee
Box 8i*5>0, University Station
Knoxville, Tennessee
Dear Jacks
Just a note to thank you most sincerely for all
the work you did for HAEB in relation to your committee
work. I wish you the best of everything.
Sincerely yours.
FEStea
Frank £• Schooley
President
